GSD.description:
video: fbdev: cirrusfb: check pixclock to avoid divide by zero

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 45800c42ef000f417270bcfc08630e42486fca99. For more details please see the references link.
